name: CheeryConversations
0:
”Alexa, open cheery conversations”
”Alexa, ask cheery conversations for the latest talk”
”Alexa, start cheery conversations”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: cheery conversations
des:
Sometimes it feels like you're lost in a seas of voices. You're not the only one! Every Wednesday on Cheery Conversations, you'll get to hear joyful conversations about the juiciest topics in today's culture. And you can join in the conversation too! Send us a one minute voice message at Voicelink.FM/CheeryConversations and you might hear your question on a future episode.
--
You can pause and play by saying "Alexa, pause" and "Alexa, resume." Just say "Alexa, stop" when you're done for the day. When listening to podcasts you can say "Alexa, shuffle" to shuffle the playing order, or "Alexa, loop" to loop the current episode. You can also ask for previous and next episodes by saying "Alexa, previous" and "Alexa, next". Your requests to this skill are not shared with the skill developer.
priv: Your requests to this skill are not shared with the skill developer.
